                <div class="h-txt t-no h-md t-col-black">The Store</div>

            <div class="sec-c l-mg">
                <div class="t-no h-sm seg-w">Store contains</div>
                <div class="t-no t-w-rg t-col-black seg-w t-s-no">
                    <p>1. The state of the app</p>
                    <p>2. A list of reducers</p>
                    <p>3. A list of subscribers</p>
